articles.title: Biden campaign continues to pressure Facebook and Twitter over Trump's false voter fraud claims
articles.description: Presumptive Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden's campaign is calling on Facebook and Twitter to remove false posts sent this week by President Donald Trump about foreign-backed voter fraud and stoking fears of a 'rigged election.'
